lead_paragraph: Sasha Artemev, who is still rehabilitating a shoulder he injured 18 months ago, easily won the United States men’s gymnastics title last night in St. Paul. Artemev, the 20-year-old son of a former Soviet gymnast, had 180.35 points. Jonathan Horton finished second with 179.3.
